title: Syllabus
text: Principles of planning To redeem high capital investment and also to profits, adequate planning is essential. All the factors should be considered and best alternative chosen. This should be make fundamental principle of mine planning. There should be flexibility and simplicity in the scheme which may be adopted finally.
